name: Touhou: Risk of Revenants
description:
After the ghosts and phantoms of the netherworld stage a revolution to escape their untimely demise, Youmu Konpaku, the half-human gardener and guardian is left worn out-- and yet there's so many spirits still racing for the gates between life and death.

The only one left to stop them is... Youmu? That can't be right.

This is a Risk of Rain/Touhou inspired fangame, starring Youmu's often shadowed other side. Play as her ghost-half as she beats back the spirits attempting to swarm her and escape the underworld.  Buy as many seconds as you can for your human-half!

---------------------------------------------
Arrow keys to move around.
Z, X, Left Shift, and C to attack.
---------------------------------------------

This game was developed for Touhou Game Jam 9. It's my first time participating in one of the Touhou Jams, but I've been itching to try one for a while. Was fun to have my first one be during a festive season! 

I'll probably be updating this with more of the ROR mechanics I had to cut for time like items, and potentially even other stages! Keep an eye out.
-RunicRhythm
